attributes.action: STOP GILLETT AND HICKS RUINING LIVERPOOL FOOTBALL CLUB HERITAGE AND HISTORY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gillet and Hicks have bought Liverpool Football Club under false pretences.  If they don't sell to someone who truly cares about the positive future of Liverpool Football Club the same may happen to LFC as happened to Leeds Utd.  Please show your support.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
